briefdescription.para: Macro that calls ndigo6g12_get_default_init_parameters_version with the correct API version.
Get the driver version in integer format.

simplesect.para: The driver version in the same format as ndigo6g12_static_info::driver_revision.

briefdescription.para: Get the driver version in string format.

simplesect.para: The Driver version including SVN build revision as a string with format x.y.z.svn.

briefdescription.para: Get the number of Ndigo6G-12 boards that are installed in the system.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to an integer in which to store the error code.
Location in which to store the error message as plain text.

briefdescription.para: Get the static information.

detaileddescription.para:
The static information does not change after the device initialization.
device
Pointer to the device from which to get the information.
static_info
Pointer to a structure in which to store the information.
See Function return values.

briefdescription.para: Get parametric information.

detaileddescription.para:
The parametric information may change due to the configuration.
device
Pointer to the device from which to get the information.
param_info
Pointer to a structure in which to store the information.
See Function return values.

briefdescription.para: Get fast status information.

detaileddescription.para:
The information can be retrieved within a few microseconds.
device
Pointer to the device from which to get the information.
fast_info
Pointer to a structure in which to store the information.
See Function return values.

briefdescription.para: Copies the default configuration to the specified config pointer.

detaileddescription.para:
device
Pointer to the device from which to get the information.
config
Pointer to a structure in which to store the configuration values.
See Function return values.
Default values of ndigo6g12_configuration:

listitem.para:
adc_mode =
NDIGO6G12_ADC_MODE_A (if application_type = NDIGO6G12_APP_TYPE_1CH)
NDIGO6G12_ADC_MODE_AD (if application_type = NDIGO6G12_APP_TYPE_2CH)
NDIGO6G12_ADC_MODE_ABCD (if application_type = NDIGO6G12_APP_TYPE_4CH)
NDIGO6G12_ADC_MODE_A (if application_type = NDIGO6G12_APP_TYPE_AVRG)

trigger[i]:
edge = true
rising = false
threshold = 512

trigger_block[i]:
enabled = false
retrigger = false
multi_shot_count = 1
precursor = 0
length = 16
sources = NDIGO6G12_TRIGGER_SOURCE_0
gates = NDIGO6G12_TRIGGER_GATE_NONE
minimum_free_packets = 0

gating_block[i]:
negate = false
retrigger = false
start = 0
stop = 1000
sources = NDIGO6G12_TRIGGER_SOURCE_0

tdc_configuration:
channel[i]:
enable = false
gating_block:
enable = false
negate = false
retrigger = false
retrigger = NDIGO6G12_TRIGGER_SOURCE_AUTO
start = 0
stop = 1000
sources = NDIGO6G12_TRIGGER_SOURCE_0
tiger_block:
mode = NDIGO6G12_TIGER_OFF
negate = true
retrigger = false
retrigger = NDIGO6G12_TRIGGER_SOURCE_AUTO
start = 0
stop = 1
sources = NDIGO6G12_TRIGGER_SOURCE_0
skip_alignment = false
alignment_mode = false
alignment_pin_high_z = false
alignment_pin_invert = false
alignment_phase_steps = 6
send_empty_packets = false

briefdescription.para: Configures the Ndigo6G-12 device.

detaileddescription.para:
The config information is copied such that it can be changed after the call to ndigo6g12_configure.
device
Pointer to the device from which to get the information.
config
Pointer to the configuration structure.
See Function return values.

briefdescription.para: Sets up the standard parameters.

detaileddescription.para: Gets a set of default parameters for ndigo6g12_init(). This must always be used to initialize the ndigo6g12_init_parameters structure.
For convinience, the macro ndigo6g12_get_default_init_parameters is provided, which automatically sets the correct client_api_version.

Default values:
card_index = 0
board_id = 0
buffer_size[0] = 64 (MiB)
buffer_size[1-7] = 0 (unused)
dma_read_delay = 1000
perf_derating = 0
led_flashing_mode = 1
clock_source = NDIGO6G12_CLOCK_SOURCE_INTERNAL
application_type = NDIGO6G12_APP_TYPE_CURRENT
force_bitstream_update = false
partial_bitstream_size = 0
partial_bitstream = nullptr
firmware_locations = nullptr
init
Pointer to a structure in which to store the initialization values.
client_api_version
NDIGO6G12_API_VERSION
See Function return values.

briefdescription.para: Open and initialize an Ndigo6G-12 board.

detaileddescription.para:
Which Ndigo6G-12 board will be initialized is determined by ndigo6g12_init_parameters::card_index.
device
Pointer to the device struct.
params
Pointer to the structure that contains the initialization parameters.
error_message
Location in which to store the error message as plain text.
See Function return values.

briefdescription.para: Finalize the driver for this device.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the device that should be finalized.

briefdescription.para: Reads packets from the board.

detaileddescription.para:
If ndigo6g12_read_in::acknowledge_last_read is true, automatically acknowledges the last read packets.
device
Pointer to the device that should be read.
in
Pointer to the structure that configures the read call.
out
Pointer to a structure in which the read-out should be stored.
See Function return values.

briefdescription.para: Gets latest error message of device.

simplesect.para: char array containing the plain text error message.

briefdescription.para: Reads the PCIe info like correctable and uncorrectable errors.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure in which to store the information.

briefdescription.para: Clear PCIe errors.

detaileddescription.para:
Only useful for PCIe problem debugging flags.
device
Pointer to the device.
flags
Specify which flags to clear.
CRONO_PCIE_CORRECTABLE_FLAG: clear all correctable errors
CRONO_PCIE_UNCORRECTABLE_FLAG: clear all uncorrectable errors
char array containing the plain text error message. embed:rst:leading-asterisk * Relevant defines: * * .. doxygengroup:: pcieclearflags * :content-only: *

briefdescription.para: Convert state to plain text.

parameterdescription.para: The device state as stored in ndigo6g12_fast_info::state.

simplesect.para: char array containing the state as plain text.

briefdescription.para: Start data acquisition.
Stop data acquisition.
Enables manual triggering of the ADC channels.

parameterdescription.para: A bit mask that chooses which channels to trigger.

briefdescription.para: Enables single-shot recording of the ADC channels.

detaileddescription.para: Instead of continously triggering on input signals, only trigger and record a ndigo6g12_trigger_block::multi_shot_count number of events.
Note: Up to firmware revision 1.24120, this feature is bugged in 4-channel mode while ndigo6g12_trigger_block::multi_shot_count >1.

Requires that ndigo6g12_trigger_block::enabled is false.
device
Pointer to the device.
channel_mask
A bit mask that chooses which channels to trigger.
See Function return values.

briefdescription.para: The functions provided by the API are declared in ndigo6G12_interface.h.

detaileddescription.para: The API is a DLL with C linkage.
